artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Kakumotoya Kinjirō
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 24; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 185 no. 285, p. 305.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: two sheets, unattached: figure seated in foreground looking to L, with horrified expression; figure is holding large bush in PR hand; powerful looking figures in shadow in background above building; female figures in shadow in middle ground, in front of building; murder scene at UL in shadow
dimension: 14 3/16 × 9 5/8 in. (36.04 × 24.45 cm) (image, each, vertical ōban diptych)
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳年 {Yoshitoshi} | Censor seal: 申七改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Memorial portrait of the actor Onoe Kikugorō IV.
title: Kiku's Shadows
